title: US: ICE Arrest at FIFA Event Spotlights Dangers for World Cup

content: (New York) The arrest and return of an asylum seeker who took his children to the Club World Cup soccer tournament final on July 13, 2025, raises serious concerns about the safety of noncitizens atte… [+11836 chars]
